hero.heading: Your Checklist
hero.copy: Here's a checklist of things to consider before heading into a store. Fill it out, print it, make notes on it and take it with you.

instruction.title: Pro Install
content: A professional will accurately measure your entry doors for you.
You don't have to worry about accidentally voiding your warranty.
We'll clean up the mess and dispose of your old entry doors for you.

instruction.title: Measurements
content: Doing it yourself? You can add your entry door sizes below.
We recommend taking photos of your entry doors and bringing them along. Selfies are welcome.

link.text: How to measure your entry doors

next.heading: Ready to talk entry doors? So are we.
